name: Shop Guelph Local
description: I wanted to help local businesses being impacted by COVID-19. I knew of many that had pivoted to offering shopping alternatives, but it was hard to find which stores were still operating without knowing the store and following their social media. I created a quick build with the Gatsby Tailwind Starter with the goal of creating better visibility for who is offering alternative, and what they are.

name: ChoreCheck
description: A concept app to create chore lists for multiple users in a household.

name: Superdad Jokes
description: Search for a Marvel character. Get a random dad joke. Customize the background, text, and frame of your card! Uses the Marvel API and icanhazdadjokes API in order to get an image of a Marvel character and a dad joke

name: Code Play!
description: I love to play with CSS, experiment with animations, and learn new skills!

name: Get Hooked on Comics
description: Find out which comic you should read with this interactive web application. Each question returns an array of matching titles, and returned titles are tallied at the end to find the best match

name: Get Lit
description: A reading recommendation app based on a provided brief. Get Lit uses the Goodreads API to display recommended books in a chosen genre, and Firebase to allow user to login and save books to their own shelf. Created with Caroline Pisano and Rocky Chung.

name: Lisbon
description: Single page website replicated from PSD design. Pixel perfect and fully responsive.
